subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=망|eumhun=|rv=mang|mr=mang|y=mang}}

# [[바라다]] (''barada'') to [[desire]], [[expect]], [[hope]]
# [[바라보다]] (''baraboda'') to [[gaze]], [[look]]
# [[우러러보다]] (''ureoreoboda'') to [[admire]], [[respect]]
# [[엿보다]] (''yeotboda, yeot-'') to [[peek]], [[peep]]
# [[이름]] (''ireum'') [[name]], [[fame]]
# [[보름]] (''boreum'') [[full moon]]

subSections.title: Words
subSections.text:
# [[희망]] ([[希望]], ''himang'') [[hope]]
# [[망원경]] ([[望遠鏡]], ''manwongyeong'') [[telescope]]
# [[절망]] ([[絶望]], ''jeolmang'') [[despair]]
# [[전망]] ([[展望]], ''jeonmang'') [[view]], [[outlook]]
# [[실망]] ([[失望]], ''shilmang'') [[disappointment]], [[disillusionment]]
# [[망제]] ([[望祭]], ''mangje'') [[ancestor worship]]
# [[원망하다]] ([[怨望]], ''wonmanghada'') to [[deplore]], [[reproach]]
# [[선망하다]] ([[羨望]], ''seonmang'') to [[envy]]
# [[망루]] ([[望樓]], ''mangru'') [[watchtower]]
